mapper.insert: insert into beans_mall_cart(memberId, beanId, beanCount) values(#{memberId}, #{beanId}, #{beanCount})
mapper.update: update beans_mall_cart set beanCount=#{beanCount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select a.cartId, a.memberId, a.beanId, a.beanCount, b.beanName, b.beanPrice, b.beanDiscount from beans_mall_cart a left outer join beans_mall_bean b on a.beanId = b.beanId where memberId = #{memberId}
select * from beans_mall_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and beanId = #{beanId}
mapper.delete: delete from beans_mall_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and beanId = #{beanId}
